tool_description: This api returns kinds of burgers with there name, image, price, ingeridients etc
title: Burgers Hub

api_list.name: Search Burger By There Name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://burgers-hub.p.rapidapi.com/find-burger/?search=chicken"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "burgers-hub.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Specific Burger
